You can use this to install pip3 and run pip3 commands.

Example:

```js
const pip3 = require('pip3');

pip3.install().then(success => {
    if (success) {
        console.log('pip3 has been succesfully installed!')
        pip3.exec('--version');
    } else {
        console.log('Installation of pip3 failed.')
    }
});
```
